code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Favorites.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Favorites=()=>{const[favorites]=useState([{id:1,name:'Sample Restaurant 1',cuisine:'Italian',image:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1514326640560-7d063ef2aed5?w=400&h=300&q=80'},{id:2,name:'Sample Restaurant 2',cuisine:'Japanese',image:'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1565299624946-b28f40a0ae38?w=400&h=300&q=80'}]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorites-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Favorites"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"favorites-grid",children:favorites.map(restaurant=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorite-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:restaurant.image,alt:restaurant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"favorite-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:restaurant.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:restaurant.cuisine}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"remove-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-heart"})," Remove from Favorites"]})]})]},restaurant.id))})]})});};export default Favorites;
